DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess comfort soft contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Subjective Comfort With Multipurpose Hydrogen Peroxide Lens Care Solutions Soft Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Wear silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear basis ; Currently use OPTIFREE RepleniSH contact lens solution ; Report comfort 75 Visual Analog Scale Baseline Visit ; Read , sign , date IRBapproved inform consent privacy document ; Be generally healthy normal ocular health ; Be willing follow study procedure visit schedule ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Use additional lens cleaner ; Known sensitivity ingredient either test article ; Systemic ocular disease disorder ( except refractive error ) would negatively affect conduct outcome study ; Prior ( within 7 day enrollment ) current ocular infection ; Clinically significant lash lid abnormality ; History ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month ; Use topical ocular systemic antibiotic corticosteroid within 7 day enrollment ; Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
